resources.string: Hello James, please select the types of notifications you wish to receive.
Notifies you when new features are released in Fusion.
Notifies you when your child\'s report cards become available online.
Notifies you of news and blog posts by your school.
Notifies you when your child\'s principals send out communications.
Notifies you about your kid bus planning and news.
Notifies you of news from the LPBSB alumni community.
